allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
Aggiunta struttura workspaces al database

- Creata tabella workspaces con campi: id, name, description, color, icon
- Aggiunto campo workspace_id alla tabella sessions con foreign key
- Implementati metodi CRUD per workspaces in SQLiteDB
- Aggiunto metodo listSessionsByWorkspace per filtrare sessioni per workspace
- Creato workspace ''default'' per sessioni esistenti tramite migration
- Aggiornata upload route per supportare workspace_id (default: ''default'')
- Aggiornati types IWorkspace e ISession
- Implementati stub per workspaces in SupabaseDB

Migration SQL: 002_add_workspaces.sql

ðŸ¤– Generated with [Claude Code](https://claude.com/claude-code)

Co-Authored-By: Claude <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
)")
Bash(npm install @radix-ui/react-label @radix-ui/react-dropdown-menu)

Bash(git commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
Implementata struttura workspace stile NotebookLM

API Routes:
- GET/POST /api/workspace - Lista e crea workspaces
- GET/PUT/DELETE /api/workspace/[id] - Gestione workspace
- GET /api/workspace/[id]/sessions - Sessioni per workspace

Ristrutturazione Route Frontend:
- /app â†’ Lista workspaces (WorkspaceGrid)
- /app/workspace/[workspaceId] â†’ Sessioni workspace
- /app/workspace/[workspaceId]/session/[sessionId] â†’ Visualizza sessione

Componenti:
- WorkspaceGrid: Grid card stile NotebookLM con colori
- CreateWorkspaceModal: Modale creazione workspace con color picker
- Nuovi UI components: Input, Label, Textarea, DropdownMenu

Modifiche:
- FileUploader: Supporto workspaceId, navigazione nuova route
- SessionList: Filtro per workspace, link aggiornati
- Aggiornati ERROR_CODES con NOT_FOUND e VALIDATION_ERROR

ðŸ¤– Generated with [Claude Code](https://claude.com/claude-code)

Co-Authored-By: Claude <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
)")

Bash(git commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
Aggiunto modale edit workspace

- Creato componente EditWorkspaceModal per modificare workspace esistenti
- Collegato bottone Edit nel dropdown menu di WorkspaceGrid
- Modale supporta modifica di: nome, descrizione, colore
- Pre-compila automaticamente i campi con valori correnti
- Ricarica lista workspace dopo salvataggio

ðŸ¤– Generated with [Claude Code](https://claude.com/claude-code)

Co-Authored-By: Claude <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
)")

Bash(git commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
fix: Mostra menu edit anche per workspace default

- Rimossa condizione che nascondeva il menu per workspace default
- Il menu con i 3 puntini ora Ã¨ visibile per tutti i workspace
- Solo l''opzione "Delete" Ã¨ nascosta per il workspace default
- Permette di editare nome, descrizione e colore anche per default workspace

ðŸ¤– Generated with [Claude Code](https://claude.com/claude-code)

Co-Authored-By: Claude <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
)")
Bash(sqlite3 data/magixcel.db ".tables")
Bash(sqlite3 data/magixcel.db "SELECT COUNT(*) as total_workspaces FROM workspaces; SELECT COUNT(*) as total_sessions FROM sessions; SELECT COUNT(*) as total_files FROM files;")
Bash(sqlite3 data/magixcel.db "SELECT name FROM sqlite_master WHERE type=''table'' AND name=''filter_presets'';")
Bash(sqlite3 data/magixcel.db "PRAGMA table_info(views);")
Bash(sqlite3 data/magixcel.db "CREATE UNIQUE INDEX IF NOT EXISTS idx_views_public_link_id ON views(public_link_id) WHERE public_link_id IS NOT NULL;")
Bash(sqlite3 data/magixcel.db "SELECT COUNT(*) as count FROM views; SELECT * FROM views LIMIT 3;")

Bash(perl -pi -e 's/IFilterPreset/IView/g; s/(?<![a-zA-Z])presets(?=,)/views/g; s/presetsLoading/viewsLoading/g; s/loadPresets/loadViews/g; s/savePreset/saveView/g; s/loadPreset/loadView/g; s/updatePreset/updateView/g; s/deletePreset/deleteView/g; s/categoryPresets/categoryViews/g; s/presetsByCategory/viewsByCategory/g' components/filters/FilterPresets.tsx)
Bash(sqlite3 data/magixcel.db "SELECT COUNT(*) as total_views, COUNT(CASE WHEN is_public = 1 THEN 1 END) as public_views FROM views;")
Bash(sqlite3 data/magixcel.db "SELECT id, original_filename FROM sessions LIMIT 3;")
Bash(sqlite3 data/magixcel.db "PRAGMA table_info(sessions);")
Bash(sqlite3 data/magixcel.db "SELECT id, name, original_file_name FROM sessions LIMIT 3;")
Bash(sqlite3 data/magixcel.db "SELECT name FROM sqlite_master WHERE type=''table'' AND name=''view_charts'';")
Bash(npm install chart.js react-chartjs-2 chartjs-plugin-zoom chartjs-plugin-datalabels date-fns)
Bash(npm install @radix-ui/react-select @radix-ui/react-checkbox)
Bash(find app/api/views/[id]/{charts,suggestions} -type f -name "*.ts" -exec perl -pi -e 's/viewId/id/g' {} ;)
Bash(perl -pi -e 's/params\.viewId/params.id/g; s/viewId as string/id as string/g' app/app/view/[id]/page.tsx)
